MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA1 postcode area of Paisley. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:03pm. Our emergency response team have arrived at he local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:36pm on Saturday, 26 December 2020
